forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Gusty winds developing. Partly cloudy this evening then becoming mostly cloudy after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
